amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to approve, renew, or implement any aviation cargo security plan that permits the transporting of unscreened or uninspected cargo on passenger planes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered ten printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of finds in the bill to approve, renew or implement any aviation cargo security plan that permits the transportation of unscreened or uninspected cargo on passenger planes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 211 (Roll no. 273).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Markey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
